message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am able to offer $1,350,000 for your product. I hope this proposal works for you.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $1,350,000 is still a bit too low for me.  How about $1,375,000? This is a good compromise and ensures that both of us get a fair deal.
I understand your position, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to offer $1,360,000 for your product. I believe this is a fair compromise given our respective positions.
